name: Let's Cube!
description:
Let's Cube!

Complete the cubes quickly and accurately! Try to complete 9 squares. It's not that easy. Be careful! This game is for you.

-Features:
• Time Attack Mode
• Sudden Death Mode
• Memory Mode
• Mirror Mode
• Endless Mode
• Scramble with your friends with Google Play Games!
• Arcade and puzzle game

TAP AND SELECT CUBE!
